name: Engineering
text: Can you create breakthrough technology instead of incremental improvements?

name: Timing
text: Is now the right time to start your particular business?

name: Monopoly
text: Are you starting with a big share of a small market?

name: People
text: Do you have the right team?

name: Distribution
text: Do you have a way to not just create but deliver your product?

name: Durability
text: Will your market position be defensible 10 and 20 years into the future?

name: Secret
text: Have you identified a unique opportunity that others donâ€™t see?
